overview:
Prior to taking the CTO position at favit, Nenko spent a semi decade in the leading Bulgarian web agency Icygen, working on the development of complex, globally marketed web services and products.

From his second grade onwards Nenko developed a real passion for mathematics and foreign languages. He was fluent in PHP and Python long before achieving a reasonable level with his mother tang. He somehow didnâ€™t know where or when to stop and as a result now he can use perfectly almost all programming languages. Nenko is a real technology polyglot. The variety of choices that he masters allows him to architecture and create fast, powerful and scalable web applications. Nenko is a proud father of two sons: a baby boy called Daniel and the Real-time engine of FAVIT.
